```{r}
library(tsbs)
```

```{r}
x <- matrix(rnorm(40), ncol = 2)
boots <- tsbs::blockBootstrap(x, num_boots = 3)
length(boots)
```


```{r}
set.seed(42)
x <- arima.sim(n = 100, list(ar = 0.8))
result <- bootstrap(
  x = x,
  block_length = 10,
  block_type = "stationary",
  num_blocks = 5,
  num_boots = 100,
  func = mean,
  apply_func_to = "cols",
  p_method = "plugin"
)
print(result$func_out_means)
```
